title: Introducing: mono mono
body:
Danish pop music is in a pretty great place right now, what with MØ conquering the charts and indie darlings Liss winning numerous tastemaker fans.

On their debut track, _CityLights_, Electro-pop duo **mono mono** (Karoline Elsig and Jakob Franck) showcase more than enough potential to suggest that they could be the next act from Denmark to hit the big time. Uber-cool, almost ANOHNI-esque at points – CityLights is gloriously romantic and intoxicatingly addictive. Check it out below.

Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
